title.rendered: Prestige Motorcars X GAS Car Club Merdeka Run 2019

content.rendered:
As we do every year on the 17th of August, is gather together and have our annual Merdeka Run with our fellow car enthusiasts. This year we started in PIK Avenue mall and made our way to Senayan Golf. We had a good turnout of 40 cars roaring down the street and had a good time catching up with some new and familiar faces during breakfast.
